value.title: Integrating PowerApps with Power BI
value.excerpt: Free training every Tuesday at 11am EST https://pragmaticworks.com/resources/free-webinars/  Do you want to learn how to integrate PowerApps with Power BI?  In this demo-heavy presentation, you'll see how to integrate PowerApps applications into Power BI reports making your reports actionable.  Free

value.title: Using the Patch Command in PowerApps for Parent Child Table Inserts
value.excerpt: in this tutorial, you'll learn how to use the Patch command to take the primary key value from inserting into one table and inject it into a second table. value.title: Power Apps Delegation workarounds – Count Rows, Max, Min, Blank & Date values
value.excerpt: In this Microsoft PowerApps video, we will look at delegation workarounds related to SharePoint as a data source. We will cover scenarios around Date Columns, Count Rows in a data source, Max and Min values, Check for Column contains data or does not contain data &   Blog post - CountRows scenario covered

value.title: Extending Power Platform Dataverse
value.excerpt: Getting started with extending Power Platform Dataverse.

topItems.title: Introduction to Common Data Service for developers
topItems.excerpt: The goal of this module is to give an introductory overview of the Power Platform SDKs that are available from Microsoft via NuGet.

topItems.title: Extend plug-ins
topItems.excerpt: The purpose of this module is to provide an in-depth overview of plug-ins as it relates to Power Platform development. This module will review how and when plug-ins are implemented, how they are registered and deployed, and the various configuration options that are available during plug-in registration.

value.title: Extending the Power Platform Common Data Service
value.excerpt: Getting started with extending the Power Platform Common Data Service can be overwhelming. This learning path looks at the tools and resources needed for extending the Power Platform. We'll start with looking at the SDKs, the extensibility model, and event framework. This learning path also covers when to use plug-ins. Configuration of plug-ins as well as registering and deploying plug-ins.

topItems.title: Introduction to Common Data Service for developers
topItems.excerpt: The goal of this module is to give an introductory overview of the Power Platform SDKs that are available from Microsoft via NuGet.

topItems.title: Extend plug-ins
topItems.excerpt: The purpose of this module is to provide an in-depth overview of plug-ins as it relates to Power Platform development. This module will review how and when plug-ins are implemented, how they are registered and deployed, and the various configuration options that are available during plug-in registration.

value.title: Manage permissions and administration for Common Data Service
value.excerpt: Do you need to manage user access rights? In this learning path, you will learn how to manage permissions associated with environments and entities.  You will also learn about different administrative portals and how to access each.

topItems.title: Get started with security roles in Common Data Service
topItems.excerpt: Do you want to use security roles to limit user permissions? This module will show you how you can set permissions to limit access to an environment or limit which users can view, edit, or delete data in an environment within Common Data Service.

topItems.title: Use administration options for Common Data Service
topItems.excerpt: Do you need to use administration options that are available for Common Data Service? This module will show you how you can use solutions within Common Data Service and administer environments.

value.title: Manage permissions and administration for Dataverse
value.excerpt: Do you need to manage user access rights? In this learning path, you will learn how to manage permissions associated with environments and entities.  You will also learn about different administrative portals and how to access each.

topItems.title: Get started with security roles in Common Data Service
topItems.excerpt: Do you want to use security roles to limit user permissions? This module will show you how you can set permissions to limit access to an environment or limit which users can view, edit, or delete data in an environment within Common Data Service.

topItems.title: Use administration options for Common Data Service
topItems.excerpt: Do you need to use administration options that are available for Common Data Service? This module will show you how you can use solutions within Common Data Service and administer environments.

value.title: Use the UI and controls in a canvas app in Power Apps
value.excerpt: The app user experience often defines the success of your app. This learning path will focus on how to provide the best app navigation, and build the best UI using themes, icons, images, personalization, different form factors, and controls.

topItems.title: Navigation in a canvas app in Power Apps
topItems.excerpt: App users can only navigate through the navigation options provided by an app developer, and this module is designed to help you build a good navigation experience for your canvas app.

topItems.title: How to build the UI in a canvas app in Power Apps
topItems.excerpt: Do you want to build a better UI for app users? This module helps you do that using themes, icons, images, personalization, different form factors, and controls.

topItems.title: Use and understand Controls in a canvas app in Power Apps
topItems.excerpt: Controls help create a better experience for the user and collect the appropriate data. This module will help you understand and use Controls.

value.title: Author a basic formula to change properties in a Power Apps canvas app
value.excerpt: Want to enhance your Power Apps canvas app? You can use basic formulas to make changes to control properties.  This will include changing the format, position, simple calculations, and implementing conditional formatting.

value.title: Becoming a solution architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to become a solution architect.

value.title: Use and understand Controls in a canvas app in Power Apps
value.excerpt: Controls help create a better experience for the user and collect the appropriate data. This module will help you understand and use Controls.

value.title: Create and manage fields within an entity in Common Data Service
value.excerpt: Do you want to create new data fields or leverage exiting standardized fields for your business solutions?  This module will show you how to manage or create new fields within an entity in Common Data Service.

value.title: Introduction to Common Data Service for developers
value.excerpt: The goal of this module is to give an introductory overview of the Power Platform SDKs that are available from Microsoft via NuGet.

value.title: Load/export data and create data views in Common Data Service
value.excerpt: Common Data Service lets you load data into or export entities from other entities by using Microsoft Excel. You can also create views to quickly review data that is stored within an entity.

value.title: Navigation in a canvas app in Power Apps
value.excerpt: App users can only navigate through the navigation options provided by an app developer, and this module is designed to help you build a good navigation experience for your canvas app.

value.title: Use administration options for Common Data Service
value.excerpt: Do you need to use administration options that are available for Common Data Service? This module will show you how you can use solutions within Common Data Service and administer environments.

value.title: Work with external data in a Power Apps canvas app
value.excerpt: Do you need to connect an app to access data? Then this module is for you. It focuses on connecting your app to a data source.

value.title: Working with option sets in Common Data Service
value.excerpt: Do you want to create standardized choice lists that you can use across all of your Power Apps?  This module will show you how to create new or use standard choice lists called option sets in Common Data Service.

value.title: 3 Uses for Power Apps Timer Controls
value.excerpt: #PowerApps #Timers  In this video I demo my top 3 use cases for the Timer Control in Power Apps.   You'll learn how to use the timer to: ✅Create animations (rotate objects, move objects across the screen, color fade text) ✅Do automatic redirects  ✅Implement background refreshes for your data sources

value.title: Power Apps Timer Value to Hours, Minutes, Seconds
value.excerpt: #PowerApps #TimerControl Have you ever needed to track how long it's taking to complete a process in your Power App?
